Header.title: COMPREHENSIVE. EFFICIENT. ACCURATE.
Header.paragraph: Highly trained, experienced staff, outstanding customer support, and a laboratory that exceeds all relevant accreditations..

About.paragraph: SM Diagnostics is a well-recognized laboratory that has the best management and ownership that provides the most comprehensive and extensive testing menu available. Since 2005 we have served the clinical market making us one of the top laboratories in the industry. We deliver world-class testing procedures to ensure accurate, reliable, and timely results. With our highly trained, experienced staff, outstanding customer support, and a laboratory that exceeds all relevant accreditations, SM Diagnostics is the leader in Laboratory testing in South Florida and throughout the nation. We are dedicated to meet the growing needs of the physicians that depend on us for accurate and reliable results by using the most advanced instruments as well as continually exploring new methods for the most cutting-edge technology available. It is our mission to work hand in hand with our customers because we understand the importance of clinical laboratory testing in order to diagnose and plan the treatment of their patients.

Faqs.question: What services do you offer?
Faqs.answer: Predictive & Diagnostic Genetic testing, In-house performed qualitative immunoassay testing, In-house performed quantitative confirmations with highly accurate LC/MS/MS technology, An extensive drug testing offering, Customizable drug testing panels, Consulting services with industry-leading staff geneticists and toxicologists, Timely, easy to read reports, Multiple reporting options, Point of Care (POC) screening devices, Customized collection and pick-up services

Faqs.question: What makes SM Diagnostics different?
Faqs.answer: Industry-leading turnaround time, Customizable panel options, Diagnostic laboratory expertise, Multiple billing options including a direct bill to insurance and client bill (where allowable)

Faqs.question: Who do I contact at SM Diagnostics to discuss results?
Faqs.answer: Customer support at (786)422-1679 can assist with facilitating your request.

Faqs.question: What is SM Diagnostics turnaround time?
Faqs.answer: 24 hours for immunoassay-qualitative results, 36 hours for LC/MS/MS quantification, PGx Testing- 5-7 days, CGx Testing- 10-15 days, UTI Testing- 48-72 hours

Faqs.question: How can I customize my test panels with SM Diagnostics?
Faqs.answer: Customization allows you to tailor your monitoring protocol based upon the unique needs of your practice and patients. Contact your sales representative or contact customer support at (800) 641-0133 to discuss the value of test panel customization to your practice.

Faqs.question: What are your hours of operation?
Faqs.answer: Our normal business hours are M-F 9 a.m.- 5 p.m. EST, After hours contact: info@lab24inc.com

Faqs.question: What are SM Diagnostics results reporting options?
Faqs.answer: Automatic delivery of your results via fax server-no paper printing required, Automated delivery of our results into your EMR through an HL7 interface
